text: Richmond City Hall Observation Deck is the observation deck on the 18th floor of the Richmond, Virginia City Hall. It's free to the public. Access is through the elevators on the main floor. View from Richmond Virginia City Hall Observation Deck - South (overlooking the Virginia State Capitol) View from Richmond Virginia City Hall Observation Deck - East ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Richmond, Virginia Category:Tourist attractions in Richmond, Virginia Category:Observation decks
title: Richmond City Hall Observation Deck
